017package com.fns.grivet.repo;
018
019import java.sql.Timestamp;
020import java.sql.Types;
021import java.time.LocalDateTime;
022import java.util.ArrayList;
023import java.util.Arrays;
024import java.util.Collection;
025import java.util.Collections;
026import java.util.Comparator;
027import java.util.HashMap;
028import java.util.List;
029import java.util.Map;
030import java.util.stream.Collectors;
031import java.util.stream.Stream;
032import org.apache.commons.lang3.ObjectUtils;
033import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
034import org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate;
035import org.springframework.jdbc.core.SqlParameterValue;
036import org.springframework.jdbc.core.SqlRowSetResultSetExtractor;
037import org.springframework.jdbc.core.simple.SimpleJdbcInsert;
038import org.springframework.jdbc.support.rowset.SqlRowSet;
039import org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.User;
040import org.springframework.stereotype.Repository;
041import org.springframework.util.Assert;
042import com.fns.grivet.model.Attribute;
043import com.fns.grivet.model.AttributeType;
044import com.fns.grivet.model.EntityAttributeValue;
045import com.fns.grivet.model.ValueHelper;
046import com.fns.grivet.query.DynamicQuery;
047import com.fns.grivet.query.QueryBuilder;
048import com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap;
049
050@Repository
051public class JdbcEntityRepository implements EntityRepository {
052        @SuppressWarnings("all")
053        private static final org.slf4j.Logger log = org.slf4j.LoggerFactory.getLogger(JdbcEntityRepository.class);
054        private final JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate;
055        @Autowired(required = false)
056        private AuditorProvider auditorProvider;
057
058        @Autowired
059        public JdbcEntityRepository(JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate) {
060                this.jdbcTemplate = jdbcTemplate;
061        }
062
063        @Override
064        public Long newId(Integer cid, LocalDateTime createdTime) {
065                return Long.valueOf(String.valueOf(new SimpleJdbcInsert(jdbcTemplate).withTableName("entity").usingGeneratedKeyColumns("eid").usingColumns("cid", "created_time").executeAndReturnKey(ImmutableMap.of("cid", cid, "created_time", Timestamp.valueOf(createdTime)))));
066        }
067
068        @Override
069        public void save(Long eid, Attribute attribute, AttributeType attributeType, Object rawValue, LocalDateTime createdTime) {
070                Assert.isTrue(rawValue != null, String.format("Attempt to persist value failed! %s\'s value must not be null!", attribute.getName()));
071                Object value = ValueHelper.toValue(attributeType, rawValue);
072                String createdBy = getCurrentUsername();
073                String[] columns = {"eid", "aid", "val", "created_time"};
074                Map<String, Object> keyValuePairs = ImmutableMap.of("eid", eid, "aid", attribute.getId(), "val", value, "created_time", Timestamp.valueOf(createdTime));
075                if (createdBy != null) {
076                        columns = Arrays.copyOf(columns, columns.length + 1);
077                        columns[columns.length - 1] = "created_by";
078                        Map<String, Object> keyValuePairsWithCreatedBy = new HashMap<>(keyValuePairs);
079                        keyValuePairsWithCreatedBy.put("created_by", createdBy);
080                        keyValuePairs = keyValuePairsWithCreatedBy;
081                }
082                new SimpleJdbcInsert(jdbcTemplate).withTableName(String.join("_", "entityav", attributeType.getType())).usingColumns(columns).execute(keyValuePairs);
083        }
084
085        @Override
086        public List<EntityAttributeValue> findByCreatedTime(Integer cid, LocalDateTime createdTimeStart, LocalDateTime createdTimeEnd) {
087                String sql = QueryBuilder.newInstance().appendCreatedTimeRange().build();
088                log.trace("JdbcEntityRepository.findByCreatedTime[sql=%s]".formatted(sql));
089                return mapRows(jdbcTemplate.query(sql, new SqlRowSetResultSetExtractor(), new SqlParameterValue(Types.INTEGER, cid), new SqlParameterValue(Types.TIMESTAMP, Timestamp.valueOf(createdTimeStart)), new SqlParameterValue(Types.TIMESTAMP, Timestamp.valueOf(createdTimeEnd))));
090        }
091
092        @Override
093        public Integer getClassIdForEntityId(Long eid) {
094                String sql = "SELECT cid FROM entity WHERE eid = ?";
095                log.trace("JdbcEntityRepository.getClassIdForEntityId[sql=%s]".formatted(sql));
096                return jdbcTemplate.queryForObject(sql, new Object[] {eid}, Integer.class);
097        }
098
099        @Override
100        public List<EntityAttributeValue> findByEntityId(Long eid) {
101                String sql = QueryBuilder.newInstance().obtainValuesForOneEntity().build();
102                log.trace("JdbcEntityRepository.findById[sql=%s]".formatted(sql));
103                return mapRows(jdbcTemplate.query(sql, new SqlRowSetResultSetExtractor(), new SqlParameterValue(Types.BIGINT, eid)));
104        }
105
106        @Override
107        public void delete(Long eid) {
108                String entitySql = "DELETE FROM entity WHERE eid = ?";
109                log.trace("JdbcEntityRepository.delete[sql=%s]".formatted(entitySql));
110                jdbcTemplate.update(entitySql, new Object[] {eid});
111                Collection<String> eavSql = Stream.of(AttributeType.values()).collect(Collectors.toMap(k -> k.getType(), v -> "DELETE FROM entityav_%s WHERE eid = ?".formatted(v.getType()))).values();
112                for (String sql : eavSql) {
113                        log.trace("JdbcEntityRepository.delete[sql=%s]".formatted(sql));
114                        jdbcTemplate.update(sql, new Object[] {eid});
115                }
116        }
117
118        @Override
119        public void deleteAll() {
120                String entitySql = "DELETE FROM entity";
121                log.trace("JdbcEntityRepository.delete[sql=%s]".formatted(entitySql));
122                jdbcTemplate.execute(entitySql);
123                Collection<String> eavSql = Stream.of(AttributeType.values()).collect(Collectors.toMap(k -> k.getType(), v -> "DELETE FROM entityav_%s".formatted(v.getType()))).values();
124                for (String sql : eavSql) {
125                        log.trace("JdbcEntityRepository.delete[sql=%s]".formatted(sql));
126                        jdbcTemplate.execute(sql);
127                }
128        }
129
130        @Override
131        public List<EntityAttributeValue> findAllEntitiesByCid(Integer cid) {
132                String sql = QueryBuilder.newInstance().obtainValuesForEntitiesByCid().build();
133                log.trace("JdbcEntityRepository.findAllByCid[sql=%s]".formatted(sql));
134                return mapRows(jdbcTemplate.query(sql, new SqlRowSetResultSetExtractor(), new SqlParameterValue(Types.INTEGER, cid)));
135        }
136
137        @Override
138        public List<EntityAttributeValue> executeDynamicQuery(Integer cid, DynamicQuery query) {
139                Assert.isTrue(query.areConjunctionsHomogenous(), "Query cannot be executed! All conjunctions must be homogenous!");
140                String sql = QueryBuilder.newInstance().append(query).build();
141                log.trace("JdbcEntityRepository.executeDynamicQuery[sql=%s]".formatted(sql));
142                List<SqlParameterValue> values = new ArrayList<>();
143                values.add(new SqlParameterValue(Types.INTEGER, cid));
144                values.addAll(Arrays.asList(query.asSqlParameterValues()));
145                return mapRows(jdbcTemplate.query(sql, new SqlRowSetResultSetExtractor(), values.toArray(new Object[values.size()])));
146        }
147
148        private List<EntityAttributeValue> mapRows(SqlRowSet rowSet) {
149                List<EntityAttributeValue> result = new ArrayList<>();
150                EntityAttributeValue eav = null;
151                if (rowSet != null) {
152                        while (rowSet.next()) {
153                                eav = EntityAttributeValue.of(rowSet.getLong("eid"), rowSet.getInt("attribute_id"), rowSet.getString("attribute_name"), rowSet.getObject("attribute_value"), rowSet.getTimestamp("created_time").toLocalDateTime(), getCurrentUsername());
154                                result.add(eav);
155                        }
156                }
157                Collections.sort(result, new EAVComparator());
158                return result;
159        }
160
161        private String getCurrentUsername() {
162                String username = null;
163                User principal = auditorProvider == null ? null : auditorProvider.getCurrentUser();
164                if (principal != null) {
165                        username = principal.getUsername();
166                }
167                return username;
168        }
169
170
171        private static class EAVComparator implements Comparator<EntityAttributeValue> {
172                @Override
173                public int compare(EntityAttributeValue eav1, EntityAttributeValue eav2) {
174                        return ObjectUtils.compare(eav1.getId(), eav2.getId());
175                }
176        }
177}
